NC.Q: Among the flows from node Business to node Budget Hotel, from node Africa to node Education, and from node Oceania to node Business, which path has the largest flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Medical to node Resort, from node Business to node Boutique Hotel, and from node Education to node Budget Hotel, which path has the largest flow?
